setting.label: From Name
setting.name: mail_name
setting.description: Enter the name you want the emails from the system to come from in the field below.

setting.label: From Address
setting.name: mail_from
setting.description: Enter the email address you want the emails from the system to come from in the field below.

setting.label: Send through SMTP
setting.name: mail_smtp
setting.description: Emails typically get sent through the web server using the PHP mail() function. Alternatively you can have emails sent out using SMTP, usually requiring a username and password, and optionally using an external mail server.

value.name: Send emails through an SMTP server

setting.label: SMTP Host
setting.name: mail_smtp_host
setting.description: In some cases, you might need to include ssl:// in the hostname

setting.label: SMTP Port
setting.name: mail_smtp_port
setting.description: Default: 25. Also commonly on port 465 (SMTP over SSL) or port 587.

setting.label: Email Queue
setting.name: mail_queueing
setting.description: Utilizing an email queue, you can allow your website to throttle the emails being sent out to prevent overloading the mail server.

setting.label: Mail Count
setting.name: mail_count
setting.description: The number of emails to send out each time the Background Mailer task is run.
